channel.title: Updates on Project RED
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Project RED

item.title: PRVC Demonstration
item.description: OK we wanted to post another update showing a bit more about how our prototype ventilator is working.

item.title: Alpha Prototype
item.description: Our ventilator prototype has been up and breathing under software control for the past few days.

item.title: Concept
item.description: Our ventilator design is based on a high-speed blower which is capable of providing the pressure and flow necessary to ventilate a patient's lungs.
